Introduction
About Funeral Quest
Funeral Quest is a simulator to let you experience the world's second oldest profession - the Undertaker.

You will face some mighty stiff competition however, because your adversaries will be some very alive human beings in this cutthroat game of capitalism.

Flash 5 or newer required.
How it works

You get a limited number of "turns" per day.

Use these turns to sell caskets and earn Bury Points and Casket Receipts. Use these to damage other parlors and upgrade your own parlor to better deal with customers.

Every day at midnight (server time) everyone's turns will be replenished and a new day will begin.

This turn system is great for those that don't have a lot of time to play.
Technical issues
This game requires the browser plug in Flash to play.

There are some issues with Flash running under Linux and the Mac we're trying to work them out.

If the chatroom text is bouncing around annoyingly you can fix this by installing the latest version of Flash.

FQ Works with Netscape 4.7 and newer and IE 4 and newer.

If the server response seems sluggish, try clearing your internet cache, this can fix the problem.
